verses.translation: A supplicant asked for a punishment bound to happen
To the disbelievers; of it there is no preventer
[It is] from Allah, owner of the ways of ascent

verses.text: تَعۡرُجُ ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ إِلَيۡهِ فِي يَوۡمٖ كَانَ مِقۡدَارُهُۥ خَمۡسِينَ أَلۡفَ سَنَةٖ
verses.translation: The angels and the Spirit will ascend to Him during a Day the extent of which is fifty thousand years
verses.transliteration: TaAAruju almalaikatu waalrroohu ilayhi fee yawmin kana miqdaruhu khamseena alfa sanatin

verses.translation: So be patient with gracious patience
Indeed, they see it [as] distant
But We see it [as] near
On the Day the sky will be like murky oil
And the mountains will be like wool
And no friend will ask [anything of] a friend

verses.text: يُبَصَّرُونَهُمۡۚ يَوَدُّ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُ لَوۡ يَفۡتَدِي مِنۡ عَذَابِ يَوۡمِئِذِۭ بِبَنِيهِ
verses.translation: They will be shown each other. The criminal will wish that he could be ransomed from the punishment of that Day by his children
verses.transliteration: Yubassaroonahum yawaddu almujrimu law yaftadee min AAathabi yawmiithin bibaneehi

verses.translation: And his wife and his brother
And his nearest kindred who shelter him

verses.text: وَمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا ثُمَّ يُنجِيهِ
verses.translation: And whoever is on earth entirely [so] then it could save him
verses.transliteration: Waman fee alardi jameeAAan thumma yunjeehi

verses.translation: No! Indeed, it is the Flame [of Hell]
A remover of exteriors
It invites he who turned his back [on truth] and went away [from obedience]
And collected [wealth] and hoarded
Indeed, mankind was created anxious
When evil touches him, impatient
And when good touches him, withholding [of it]
Except the observers of prayer
Those who are constant in their prayer
And those within whose wealth is a known right
For the petitioner and the deprived
And those who believe in the Day of Recompense

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنۡ عَذَابِ رَبِّهِم مُّشۡفِقُونَ
verses.translation: And those who are fearful of the punishment of their Lord
verses.transliteration: Waallatheena hum min AAathabi rabbihim mushfiqoona

verses.translation: Indeed, the punishment of their Lord is not that from which one is safe
And those who guard their private parts

verses.text: إِلَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَزۡوَٰجِهِمۡ أَوۡ مَا مَلَكَتۡ أَيۡمَٰنُهُمۡ فَإِنَّهُمۡ غَيۡرُ مَلُومِينَ
verses.translation: Except from their wives or those their right hands possess, for indeed, they are not to be blamed
verses.transliteration: Illa AAala azwajihim aw ma malakat aymanuhum fainnahum ghayru maloomeena

verses.text: فَمَنِ ٱبۡتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡعَادُونَ
verses.translation: But whoever seeks beyond that, then they are the transgressors
verses.transliteration: Famani ibtagha waraa thalika faolaika humu alAAadoona

verses.translation: And those who are to their trusts and promises attentive
And those who are in their testimonies upright
And those who [carefully] maintain their prayer
They will be in gardens, honored
So what is [the matter] with those who disbelieve, hastening [from] before you, [O Muhammad]
[To sit] on [your] right and [your] left in separate groups

verses.text: أَيَطۡمَعُ كُلُّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ أَن يُدۡخَلَ جَنَّةَ نَعِيمٖ
verses.translation: Does every person among them aspire to enter a garden of pleasure
verses.transliteration: AyatmaAAu kullu imriin minhum an yudkhala jannata naAAeemin

verses.translation: No! Indeed, We have created them from that which they know

verses.text: فَلَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِرَبِّ ٱلۡمَشَٰرِقِ وَٱلۡمَغَٰرِبِ إِنَّا لَقَٰدِرُونَ
verses.translation: So I swear by the Lord of [all] risings and settings that indeed We are able
verses.transliteration: Fala oqsimu birabbi almashariqi waalmagharibi inna laqadiroona

verses.text: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ خَيۡرٗا مِّنۡهُمۡ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَسۡبُوقِينَ
verses.translation: To replace them with better than them; and We are not to be outdone
verses.transliteration: AAala an nubaddila khayran minhum wama nahnu bimasbooqeena

verses.text: فَذَرۡهُمۡ يَخُوضُواْ وَيَلۡعَبُواْ حَتَّىٰ يُلَٰقُواْ يَوۡمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: So leave them to converse vainly and amuse themselves until they meet their Day which they are promised
verses.transliteration: Fatharhum yakhoodoo wayalAAaboo hatta yulaqoo yawmahumu allathee yooAAadoona

verses.text: يَوۡمَ يَخۡرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَجۡدَاثِ سِرَاعٗا كَأَنَّهُمۡ إِلَىٰ نُصُبٖ يُوفِضُونَ
verses.translation: The Day they will emerge from the graves rapidly as if they were, toward an erected idol, hastening
verses.transliteration: Yawma yakhrujoona mina alajdathi siraAAan kaannahum ila nusubin yoofidoona

verses.text: خَٰشِعَةً أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ تَرۡهَقُهُمۡ ذِلَّةٞۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمُ ٱلَّذِي كَانُواْ يُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: Their eyes humbled, humiliation will cover them. That is the Day which they had been promised
verses.transliteration: KhashiAAatan absaruhum tarhaquhum thillatun thalika alyawmu allathee kanoo yooAAadoona
